data.sql: select (select SUM(Hours) from CDT where Type='HC') AS Total_HC_Hours, ((select SUM(Hours) from CDT) - (select SUM(Hours) from CDT where Type='HC')) AS Onsite_Hours, (select SUM(Hours) from CDT) AS Total_Hours, ((select SUM(Hours) from CDT where Type='HC') / (select SUM(Hours) from CDT)) AS Remote_Percentage;
